title: Doing business in Japan
creator_credit: Business Council for International Understanding and Vision Associates
brief_description: This film deals with the difficulties and complications that arise, in international business relationships, as a result of the cultural barriers that exist. The film is designed to be a teaching/training tool that can be used as the focus of a discussion or course of study.
